metadata.title: Friday, 18th November, 2011
metadata.session: FIRST SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Mines and Natural Resources when the Game Management Area, in Chief Machiya’s area in Mpongwe District, will be gazetted.
Minister of Education, Science and Vocational Training how many of the following categories of schools there were in Zambia
parts: (a)    Upper Basic Schools, from January, 2008 to January, 2010;
(b)    Grant Aided Schools, as of August, 2011; and

questions.minister: Minister of Justice whether the Government has any plans to re-constitute the Task Force on Corruption.
Minister of Home Affairs what measures the Government has taken to arrest the criminals who have been linked to several murder cases in the Luano Valley of Mkushi South Parliamentary Constituency.

Minister of Information, Broadcasting and Tourism what benefits Zambia will derive from co-hosting with Zimbabwe, the 20th United Nations World Tourism Organisation General Assembly in 2013 considering that Zimbabwe has a competitive advantage in the tourism industry over Zambia.
questions.question_text: ORDER OF THE DAY 1    Supply - Motion (11th November) - Resumption of Debate.
